tiled.util

Class BasicTileCutter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiled.util.BasicTileCutter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TileCutter

    public class BasicTileCutter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TileCutter
    Cuts tiles from a tileset image according to a regular rectangular pattern. Supports a variable spacing between tiles and a margin around them.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicTileCutter(int tileWidth, int tileHeight, int tileSpacing, int tileMargin) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this tile cutter.
      java.awt.Image getNextTile()
      Retrieves the next tile image.
      java.awt.Dimension getTileDimensions()
      Returns the default tile dimensions of tiles cut by this cutter.
      int getTileMargin()
      Returns the margin around the tile images.
      int getTileSpacing()
      Returns the spacing between tile images.
      int getTilesPerRow()
      Returns the number of tiles per row in the tileset image.
      void reset()
      Resets the tile cutter so that the next call to getNextTile will return the first tile.
      void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Sets the image that this cutter should cut in tile images.
